post.body: drink one for me cuz I wuv you
touché, madam, touché!
pics or it didn't happen!
thts a lovely shot!
and your never-ending bottle of hooch is bigger on the inside.
your last two tweete were the eputomy of 'fail' to 'win'
more importantly is what you name it.
Cowboy boots+ icy Boston sidewalk= fail
Totally walking on a frozen pond! http://snipurl.com/9gefw
good night, internet. It is time for beer, after a succesful pour.
Torches at hand, we get ready to open the fiery furnace and pour molten bronze.
Doing another cast of the Safety Third medals tonight- I have the macro photo box all set up for **sexy photos** after.
Lamenting the demise of PBF comics.
working?
I can't tell you how much travelling has hightened my love of cooking. Now: butternut squash gratin. Nom.
dear internets: it is possible to control a Magic-Eye tube with a light sensor. FYI.
I think this kombucha has more than the warned 'less than o.5%' C2H5; either that, or I am an *extremely* cheap date.
Just finished polishing Sparrow's safety third medal. This deserves a sammich!
I just realized I actually had quite a productive year. Also, I dreamt of baby platapi.
Playing scrabble with psychopaths and watchin Lilo and Stitch.
